text: The Shining is a 1980 British horror drama movie. It is set during winter in a hotel in rural Colorado. It was directed by Stanley Kubrick. It is based on Stephen King's book of the same name. The movie stars Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, and Scatman Crothers. It was theatrically released in the United States on May 23, 1980, by Warner Bros., and in the United Kingdom on October 2, 1980, by Columbia Pictures through Columbia-EMI-Warner Distributors.
